00017 #include <inttypes.h>
00018 #include <avr/sfr_defs.h>
00019 #include <avr/io.h>
00020 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00021 #include <stdio.h>

00023 #include "spi.h"
00024 
00025 #define SPI_DDR  DDRB
00026 #define SPI_PORT PORTB
00027 #define SPI_MOSI PB5
00028 #define SPI_MISO PB6
00029 #define SPI_SCK  PB7
00030 #define SPI_SS   PB4
00031 
00032 
00036 void
00037 SPI_SSOn(void) {
00038   SPI_PORT &= ~_BV(SPI_SS);
00039 }
00040 
00044 void
00045 SPI_SSOff(void) {
00046   SPI_PORT |= _BV(SPI_SS);
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00056 void
00057 SPI_SendBlock(uint8_t * input, uint16_t length) {
00058   uint16_t i = 0;
00059   while(i < length)
00060     SPI_TrxByte(input[i++]);
00061 }
00062 
00070 void
00071 SPI_GetBlock(uint8_t * input, uint16_t length, uint8_t filler) {
00072   uint16_t i = 0;
00073   while(i < length)
00074     input[i++] = SPI_TrxByte(filler);
00075 }
00076 
00084 uint8_t
00085 SPI_TrxByte(uint8_t input) {
00086   uint8_t status;
00087 
00088   SPDR = input;
00089   while( !(SPSR & _BV(SPIF)) );
00090   status = SPDR;
00091 
00092   return status;
00093 }
00094 
00098 void
00099 SPI_Init(void) {
00100   /* Master mode: MISO is Input; SS, MOSI, and SCK is output */
00101   SPI_DDR &= ~(_BV(SPI_MISO));
00102   SPI_DDR |= _BV(SPI_SS) | _BV(SPI_MOSI) | _BV(SPI_SCK);
00103 
00104   /* Setup MISO with a pull-up resistor */
00105   SPI_PORT |= _BV(SPI_MISO);
00106 
00107   SPI_SSOff();
00108 
00109   /* Setup SPCR
00110    * SPI enabled, master mode, fck/2, MSB first
00111    */
00112   SPCR |= _BV(SPE) | _BV(MSTR) | _BV(SPI2X);
00113 }
